Beachcomber/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror:



Double Punch was angry.  As she retreated, he opened both his pinchers now, 
firing two energy-signature seeking missiles off at Shadow Wing.

Injector fired off two stinger missiles at Shadow Wing.  After he and 
Manterror had cried out in pain from optic blasts.

Manterror raised his weapons at Cyber Claw.  "Speak quickly, or you will 
never speak again!"

---

"I have a friend out there!" Beachcomber yelled, running out of the Ark and 
heading for where he saw explosions on a cliff.
